name: Grammarly
description: Grammarly helps you write clear, mistake-free content with AI-powered suggestions for grammar, tone, and clarity.
about: Grammarly is a comprehensive writing assistant that goes beyond grammar checking. It provides suggestions for clarity, engagement, and delivery, helping you communicate more effectively. With tone detection and genre-specific writing style checks, Grammarly adapts to your needs whether you're writing emails, reports, or creative content.

seo.metaDescription: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps you write clearly with grammar, spelling, and style suggestions.
